<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.STTRMTransition</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Customer customization point for the STTRMTransitionSNC class</description> <name>STTRMTransition</name> <script><![CDATA[var STTRMTransition = Class.create(); STTRMTransition.prototype = Object.extendsObject(STTRMTransitionSNC, { initialize: function(stateTransitionGr, _gs) { STTRMTransitionSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this, stateTransitionGr, _gs); },
